#SmartTable #Spreadsheet #Productivity ðŸ’¼ ÐŸÑ€Ð¾Ñ„ÐµÑÑÐ¸Ð¾Ð½Ð°Ð»ÑŒÐ½Ñ‹Ð¹ (Conventional Commits): feat(ui): major spreadsheet functionality enhancement with advanced formulas and data validation
Critical fixes: - Formula Bar now visible by default with full-width layout - Implemented Undo/Redo functionality (Ctrl+Z/Ctrl+Y) - Added auto-save to localStorage after each change
Advanced formulas (4 new): - VLOOKUP: vertical lookup in table ranges - HLOOKUP: horizontal lookup in table ranges - INDEX: retrieve value by row/column index - MATCH: find position of value in range
Data Validation: - Dropdown lists for cells with visual indicator - Click to show dropdown selection menu - AI command support: set_data_validation
Conditional Formatting: - Rule-based cell styling (>, <, =, contains operators) - Configurable background color, text color, font weight - AI command support: set_conditional_format
Find and Replace: - Global findAndReplace() function - Options: matchCase, entireCell - Batch replacement with count reporting
Global API functions exposed: - setDataValidation(), removeDataValidation() - addConditionalFormat(), clearConditionalFormats() - findAndReplace(), undo(), redo()
Technical changes: - Fixed formula-bar.css display property - Fixed TypeScript errors in formulas.ts - Optimized cell data handling - Added state tracking for validations and formats
Performance: No impact Breaking changes: None Dependencies: None added Tests: Manual testing completed

#SmartTable #Spreadsheet #Productivity ÐŸÑ€Ð¾Ñ„ÐµÑÑÐ¸Ð¾Ð½Ð°Ð»ÑŒÐ½Ñ‹Ð¹ (Conventional Commits): feat(ui): major spreadsheet functionality enhancement with advanced formulas and data validation
Critical fixes: - Formula Bar now visible by default with full-width layout - Implemented Undo/Redo functionality (Ctrl+Z/Ctrl+Y) - Added auto-save to localStorage after each change
Advanced formulas (4 new): - VLOOKUP: vertical lookup in table ranges - HLOOKUP: horizontal lookup in table ranges - INDEX: retrieve value by row/column index - MATCH: find position of value in range
Data Validation: - Dropdown lists for cells with visual indicator - Click to show dropdown selection menu - AI command support: set_data_validation
Conditional Formatting: - Rule-based cell styling (>, <, =, contains operators) - Configurable background color, text color, font weight - AI command support: set_conditional_format
Find and Replace: - Global findAndReplace() function - Options: matchCase, entireCell - Batch replacement with count reporting
Global API functions exposed: - setDataValidation(), removeDataValidation() - addConditionalFormat(), clearConditionalFormats() - findAndReplace(), undo(), redo()
Technical changes: - Fixed formula-bar.css display property - Fixed TypeScript errors in formulas.ts - Optimized cell data handling - Added state tracking for validations and formats
Performance: No impact Breaking changes: None Dependencies: None added Tests: Manual testing completed
